TermsPage.title: Terms and Conditions

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the CarShowX platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility

registration.title: 3. Event Registration
registration.content: Registration for events is subject to availability and approval. CarShowX reserves the right to reject any registration at its discretion.

conduct.title: 4. Participant Conduct
conduct.content: All participants must conduct themselves in a professional and respectful manner. Any inappropriate behavior may result in removal from the event.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability

privacy.title: 6. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Please review our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect and use your data.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: CarShowX reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at info@carshowx.app

TermsPage.introduction: By participating in our car events, you agree to follow all guidelines and regulations. Please read these terms carefully before registering.
TermsPage.section1Content: All participants must comply with local traffic laws and regulations. Reckless driving or unsafe behavior will result in immediate removal from the event.
TermsPage.section2Content: Participants must maintain respectful behavior towards other participants, organizers, and spectators. Inappropriate conduct will not be tolerated.
TermsPage.section3Content: All vehicles must be in good working condition with proper insurance and registration. Safety equipment is mandatory where required.
TermsPage.section4Content: By participating, you consent to being photographed and filmed for promotional purposes. CarShowX reserves the right to use event media.
TermsPage.section5Content: Participants participate at their own risk. CarShowX is not liable for any damages, injuries, or losses during the event.
